text: Bradford Park Avenue A.F.C. is a football club which plays in England. == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 Northern Premier League Champions / Division One 2001/02 Northern Premier League 10th / Premier Division 2002/03 Northern Premier League 7th / Premier Division 2003/04 Northern Premier League 17th / Premier Division 2004/05 Conference 22nd / North 2005/06 Northern Premier League 21st / Premier Division 2006/07 Northern Premier League 4th / Division One North 2007/08 Northern Premier League Champions / Division One North 2008/09 Northern Premier League 7th / Premier Division === Former position === ==Honours== ===Association Football=== ====Leagues==== *Football League Second Division/Championship ** Runners-up (1): 1913-14 *Football League Third Division/League One **Champions (1): 1927-28 ** Runners-up (2): 1922-23, 1925–26 *Northern Premier League Premier Division ** Playoff Winner (1): 2012 *Northern Premier League First Division **Champions (1): 2000–01 *Northern Premier League Division One North **Champions (1): 2007–08 *North West Counties League Division One **Champions (1): 1994–95 *Bradford Amateur Sunday League Division Four **Champions (2): 1974–75, 1984–85 * Football League Division One (Best) ** 9th Place 1914–15 ====Cups==== *FA Cup **Quarterfinals (3): 1912–13, 1919–20, 1945–46 == Other websites == *Official website * *Ground profile *Early history of club 1895–99 *Bradford Park Avenue History Category:English football clubs Category:1907 establishments in England
title: Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C.
